name: 3 of Them: Remake
description:
This is a simple remake of my very first game, 3 of Them.
This is only the base game, no secrets or special endings.

You get 1 star for beating the game that will be displayed on the Title-Screen.

You look around with the mouse and the LMB to use your camera's flash to make the shadows disappear, does not work on the middle one!

If you look at them the battery on your phone will be drained, when your phone is out of battery you get a game over.

.

This game was made in 2 days, report any game breaking bugs
